Control_Text: The organization employs the principle of least privilege and enforces multifactor authentication for network access to privileged accounts.
The information system protects the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest using cryptographic mechanisms.

column5: and corrects information system flaws. Critical flaws must be addressed within a specified time frame.

Control_Text: The organization retains audit records for the time period defined in the record retention policy to provide support for after-the-fact investigations.
The organization conducts backups of user-level information and system-level information contained in the information system and tests backup information.
